t = int(raw_input())

while t:
	t -= 1
	s = raw_input()
	k = []
	for i in s:
		if 'a' <= i.lower() <= 'z':
			k.append(i)
	d = {}
	for i in k:
		if d.has_key(i):
			d[i] += 1
		else:
			d[i] = 1
	for i in d.keys():
		if d[i] != 1:
			if d[i]%2 != 0:
				d[i] = d[i]/2 + 1
			else: d[i] = d[i]/2	
	cost = 0
	for i in d.values():
		cost += i
	print cost
